thread.title: UC to play home-and-home football series with Marshall
thread.title_full: UC to play home-and-home football series with Marshall

title: UC to play home-and-home football series with Marshall
text:
UC to play home-and-home football series with Marshall 
Updated: Thu, Oct 22 2015, 05:04 PM 
CINCINNATI (WKRC) -- The University of Cincinnati football team will play a home-and-home series with Marshall in 2017 and 2019, the two schools jointly announced Thursday.The Bearcats and Thundering Herd will meet on Sept. 23, 2017 in Nippert Stadium with a matchup at Joan C. Edwards Stadium un Huntington, W. Va. scheduled for Sept. 28, 2019.The schools have met 12 previous times on the gridiron, most recently in Huntington, W.Va., in 2008. UC holds an 8-3-1 edge in the all-time series and has won the past three meetings. 
AP Photo/Gary Landers
